summary:
I am a painter, graphic designer, illustrator, textile designer, a graduate of a bachelor's and master's degree program at the University of Art and Design of Cluj-Napoca, specializing in Textile Design.

In the last 7 years I created my own brand, named Adam's Studio; under the brand, I produced accessories, toys, bags, jewelry, various decorative objects, and with which I participated in various exhibitions.

In addition to the textile accessories brand, I have been an organizer in various volunteer events that aim to bring art as close as possible to the general public.
Among the topics covered were: live music, dance and graphics performances, painting workshops, jewelry, illustrations, textile art, and motivational speeches.
All events have been created to bring art as close as possible to the public and to inspire them in everything they do.
We also organized workshops where participants of all ages learned different artistic techniques of expression that are based on therapy-through-art methods.

 My passion for art made me look for different methods to express myself; I paint, draw, photograph, write, and adore human relationships.

An important step was when I was accepted in the Erasmus Scholarship Program that gave me the chance to go to Lodz, Poland, where I learned new techniques in the textile arts.
Over the years, I’ve become a professional and have participated in exhibitions, fairs, appearances in the local press and media.
I learned to sell my products and art, studying business, marketing, but also psychology, body language, and personal development.

I want to communicate what I know, to learn, and to contribute so that I can further my art. 

Here you find my pages

https://www.facebook.com/TextileThingsByOtiliaAdam/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel 
https://www.facebook.com/Otilia.Adam.DesignTextil/?ref=bookmarks

profile_positions.description:
Adam Otilia studiet at Univeristy of Art and Design from Cluj-Napoca, Textile Design profile. In the period of the master, her passion started the grounds of her brand: Textile Things by Otilia Adam, the base products being manual worked bows, plus a big diversity of products from textiles as: bags, accessories and design products. After three years in which the artist has participated in different expositions, events, market sales and including different appearances in the local press, she manages to make her own style, a lot more personal, designed for the people whom enjoy the products designed from textiles. She proposes a new design to her products, a new life, color and soul, all under a new name, a lot simple concept, minimalist uner a chromatic of passion, and this one is named: Adam’s Studio.
Adam’s studio represents a unique design of textiles from felt manually made. The embroidery is applied with traditional Romanian design. This offers the products an authentic and modern style. Olive green is perfect combined with grey and black, being able to make perfect lines, everything to make a perfect accessory for any fashion clothes. An accessory that says a lot about style, quality, unicity, simply, not only from the textile witch created it but even by the chromatics. Accessories are realized to make a plus of elegance and trust on your own style. The design is made to be more practical by keeping the originality. 
The design is made to be practical and unique. This can be used as an accessory of style, without a problem, easy to be wear on any clothing, even if you are casual or business. If you are talking about a bow, a wallet or a purse, the unique design of it, the textile and chromatic, will talk about your stile from itself. It will talk about respect and elegance indifferent of the context.
